title: Kidnapped by Danger: The Avery Jessup Story
description: The not-so-true story of CNBC reporter Avery Jessup. It’s a classic love story. Boy meets girl, girl gets kidnapped by Asian dictator.
quote: I’ll never let you capture my wife from here, on the top of the Empire State Building!
altHero: Jenna Maroney as Jessup, reaching out as she is force up a helicopter dangling ladder
alt1: a man forces Jessup to climb the helicopter ladder
alt2: Lance Drake Mandrell as Jack Donaghy fighting Kim Jong-Un
